name: 王振興
objective:
布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏
輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
schedule:
(1) Number systems
(2) Boolean algebra
(3) Discrete logic components
(4) Combinational logic
(5) Simplification and optimization
(6) Multiplexer and decoders
(7) Flip flops
(8) Counter and registers
(9) Analysis of synchronous sequential logic
(10) Synthesis of synchronous sequential logic
